name: Hippo Sports
description: Train with the clumsy hippo and push him to excel in fun activities! Whether it’s karate, jump rope or trampoline acrobatics – there’s something for everyone!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 10 / 8 / 7 / Processor: Intel Pentium (or similar AMD) 1.5 GHz Memory: 256 MB RAM Graphics: 256 MB DirectX: Version 9.0a Storage: 200 MB available space
